name: @kitiumai/config
description: Shared configuration presets (TypeScript, formatting, and tooling) for the KitiumAI monorepo.

scripts.publish:setup:
node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const os=require('os');const token=process.env.NPM_TOKEN;if(!token){console.error('Error: NPM_TOKEN environment variable not set');process.exit(1);}const isWindows=os.platform()==='win32';const homeNpmrc=path.join(os.homedir(),isWindows?'.npmrc':'.npmrc');let content='';if(fs.existsSync(homeNpmrc)){content=fs.readFileSync(homeNpmrc,'utf8');}const lines=content.split('
').filter(l=>!l.includes('//registry.npmjs.org/:_authToken'));lines.push('//registry.npmjs.org/:_authToken='+token);fs.writeFileSync(homeNpmrc,lines.join('
')+'
');console.log('âœ“ Updated user-level .npmrc with authentication');"
scripts.publish:check: npm whoami --registry https://registry.npmjs.org || (echo 'Error: Not logged in to npm. Set NPM_TOKEN or run: npm login' && exit 1)
scripts.publish:package: pnpm run publish:setup && pnpm publish --access public --no-git-checks --registry https://registry.npmjs.org
scripts.publish:dry-run: pnpm run publish:setup && pnpm publish --access public --no-git-checks --dry-run --registry https://registry.npmjs.org
